# Haibin Bai

I’m a second-year Master's student in the [Department of Biomedical Informatics and Data Science](http://dhsi.med.jhmi.edu/) 
at [Johns Hopkins School of Medicine](https://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/som/). I am interested in health service research, 
health informatics research, machine learning, and data visualization. I have many hobbies in playing sports, 
such as tennis 🎾, snowboarding 🏂, soccer ⚽️, billiard 🎱.
